Title: Relates to the effectiveness of provisions of law which requires appointing authorities to provide appointment and promotion letters
Summary: Relates to the effectiveness of provisions of law which requires appointing authorities to provide appointment and promotion letters when extending an offer of appointment or promotion to a position in the classified service.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.5760 & A.6624)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the civil service law relating to requiring appointing authorities to provide appointment and promotion letters, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 5760 and A. 6624, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
